text: Donald Trump has fired off an angry tweet about Oprah Winfrey, objecting to her interviewing style, and daring her to run for President so he can ` ` expose and defeat'' her. The television star and and entrepreneur made her appearance on the CBS 60 Minutes show to interview some Michigan voters about the president. Questions she asked included : ` ` How many people here voted for him? Just to remind everybody. And how many of you would vote for him again?'' She also asked : ` ` Who here believes that he made the comment about, quote,'s - - - hole countries?'''It appeared the president was watching Ms Winfrey interviewing his supporters, before tweeting.
